doc:
Robert Hays https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Hays 0 Robert Hays (born July 24, 1947) is an American actor, best known for his roles in film as pilot Ted Striker in Airplane! (also known as Flying High) and its sequel, and for his role as Robert Seaver in Homeward Bound: The Incredible Journey (1993). In television, he starred as the title character in 22 episodes of the science fiction series Starman (1986–1987) and as the voice of Tony Stark on Iron Man (1994). Robert_Hays ( born July_24_,_1947 ) is an_American_actor , best_known for his_roles in film as pilot_Ted_Striker in Airplane ! ( also_known as Flying_High_) and its_sequel , and for his_role as Robert_Seaver in Homeward_Bound : The_Incredible_Journey_(_1993_) . In television , he starred as the_title_character in 22_episodes of the_science_fiction_series_Starman_(_1986 – 1987_) and as the_voice of Tony_Stark on Iron_Man_(_1994_) .
